resources.string:
Welcome to Doughnut Race! 

Mr. Dough loves doughnuts. Help him eat as many doughnuts as he can while he rolls down the street. But be careful! He dislikes broccoli and lifting weights. 

Mr. Dough cannot touch more than 3 obstacles or he will lose weight and the game will end! Tilt your phone to move to a different lane to avoid the obstacles and eat doughnuts. 

Good luck and happy eating!
